In England, in the seven days to 11 May, there were 13,292 new confirmed cases (23.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 May, there were 12,157 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 9% (1,135 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 May is 3,887,487 (6,906.5 cases per 100,000 population).
